name.ja: ケミカライズ・ヴォルシールド

summoning_condition.en: This card's name becomes "Chemicalize Structure Force" while in the Graveyard.

requirement.en: Equip this card to 1 face-up Pyro/Aqua/Thunder Type monster on your field.

effect.en: The equipped monster cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. The equipped monster gains ATK equal to [the number of FIRE Attribute Pyro/Aqua/Thunder Type Maximum Monsters in your Graveyard] x 300.
